sqlQuery.name: InterproTermList
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT dr.primary_identifier AS accession, dr.primary_identifier AS name, dr.primary_identifier || ':' || dr.secondary_identifier || ' ' || dr.remark AS description FROM dots.DbRefAaFeature draf, sres.DbRef dr, sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease edr, sres.ExternalDatabase ed WHERE draf.db_ref_id = dr.db_ref_id AND dr.external_database_release_id = edr.external_database_release_id AND edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id AND ed.name = $$primaryKey$$
